msbt.message: Sosee anything around here that you might like to call your own?
Anything catch your fancy? Other than my wardrobe, of course.
Just let me know if you see anything that you want to buy. I'm always looking to wheel and deal.
Just so you know, if you see anything that you want to buy, maybe we can make a deal.
There was one thing... Ooh! I saw something!
Good to know. I didn't see anything.
Hey, by the way, if you see anything around here that catches your eye, maybe we can make a deal. I like buying new stuff more than I like keeping old stuff, so I'll probably sell whatever to you.
There was one thing... Ooh! I saw something!
Good to know. I didn't see anything.
Anything in this roomcould be in YOUR room if you play your cards just right.
I'm interested... I saw a thing I want!
Good to know. Not interested.
Alright! So, what caught your fancy?
OK! Let's get down to gold tacks. Whatcha looking at?
, how fun! Alright, what did you have your eye on?
Nothing? Nothing at all in my place interests you? Oof, I've got to rethink my whole aesthetic
Are you sure? It's OKâ€”I won't be offended. Actually, I'll be offended if you DON'T want to buy anything.
Well, OK. Just know that if someone else buys something that you kind of wanted, you'll have missed out.
Ah, good eye. I knew a connoisseur like you would appreciate my . Now, it is one of my favorites, but I could let you walk out of here with it for. Deal?
I'll take it!
Nah, never mind.
Ha HA! I see we have the exact same refined taste.That's one of my favorites, but I could let it go for . Yeah?
I'll take it!
Nah, never mind.
Well, look at you! Going right to the good stuff.I actually kind of hate to let that go, but because it's you, I could sell it for . Deal?
I'll take it!
Nah, never mind.
You sure about that? I'm not gonna haggle with you or anything
Alright, we've got a deal! Now, just hand over all those shiny BellsOoh. Looks like you don't have enough. Sorry, , but I'm gonna need full price.
Excellent. We've got a deal!
Merci beaucoup, pal-a-rino!
Thanks, !
Take good care of it for me, OK?
I hope you give it the VIP treatment in your house.
I know it's going to a good home with you, .
Uh-oh. I don't think you can fit anything else in your pockets.Lucky for you, I'm no stranger to this island's mail system. Leave the rest to me, .
Aw, I'm sorry, but I really can't sell my .It's justhe's like a pet, you know?
Youyou really want to buy my ?Sorry. Not for all the Bells in the world. She's one of my best friends!
Well, you've got a good eye, but I simply couldn't let my precious go.
Sorry. That's a load-bearing piece. The whole place would fall apart without it.
